spell.name: Sweet Talk
entries: You coat your words in syrupy sincerity. One creature that can hear and understand you gains advantage on the next Charisma (Persuasion or Deception) check you make against it within 1 minute, provided your request is not overtly harmful. The spell automatically fails against creatures that are actively hostile toward you or that do not share a language with you.

spell.name: Cocoa Compass

components.m: a chunk of dark chocolate (not consumed)

entries: A tiny silver spoon orbits your rim, always pointing toward the nearest source of edible chocolate within 1 mile. The detection radius increases to 3 miles at 11th level and 5 miles at 17th level.
While the spell persists, you have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks made to locate food or potable water.

spell.name: Melting Point
entries: Choose a non-living object you can see that is no larger than a 1-foot cube and is not being worn or carried (size increases at higher levels). The item glows cherry-red.

A creature touching the object must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage and must drop the item. On a success, it takes no damage but has disadvantage on its next ability check involving the object.

spell.name: Bitter Truth
entries: You press the bitter chocolate to the lips of a willing, incapacitated, or restrained creature. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be compelled to answer one yes-or-no question truthfully. Questions permitted increase to two at 11th level and three at 17th.
The spell does not prevent the creature from refusing to speak; it simply compels honesty if it does answer.

spell.name: Chocolate Tribute
entries: You conjure a hand-sized statuette of stylised chocolate that lasts 24 hours (or until eaten). Whoever consumes the sweet gains {@scaledice 1 1dtemp} temporary hit point(s).
The statuette is worth 1 sp in fine-food markets. Both the monetary value and the temporary hit points double at 5th, 11th, and 17th level.

spell.name: Whisk of Warming
entries: You stir the air, creating a 5-foot aura of comforting heat. Creatures in the aura have advantage on Constitution saving throws against cold weather or environmental cold.
At 11th level, creatures in the aura gain resistance to cold damage. At 17th level, creatures ignore the effects of natural extreme-cold environments while within the aura.

spell.name: Choco Splash
entries: Make a ranged spell attack against one creature: {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage. Until the start of your next turn, the next attack roll made against that target has advantage.

spell.name: Sweet Aroma
entries: Warm brownie scent billows in a 15-foot cone. Creatures in the area must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed, unable to take reactions, and have their speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of your next turn.
The cone’s length increases to 20 feet at 5th level, 25 feet at 11th level, and 30 feet at 17th level.

spell.name: Milky Shield

time.condition: when a creature targets you with an attack

entries: A spiral of chocolate milk deflects danger. You gain a +{@scaledice 1 1|+|1} bonus to AC until the start of your next turn (+2 at 5th, +3 at 11th, +4 at 17th).
If the triggering attack still hits, the attacker must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

spell.name: Chocolate Missile
entries: You hurl a solid chocolate dart. Make a ranged spell attack: {@damage 1d4} force damage, and the target’s movement speed is reduced by 5 feet until the start of your next turn.
You create additional darts at higher levels—two at 5th, three at 11th, and four at 17th level, each requiring a separate attack roll.
